It takes the element to be removed as its argument, so access_list.remove(“tshah”) removes the username “tshah”.

questions.question: 4. As a security analyst, you are responsible for developing an algorithm that automates removing usernames that match specific criteria from an access list. What Python components would help you implement this? Select three answers.
choices: A for loop that iterates through the usernames in the access list
An if statement that compares a username to the criteria for removal
correct_answers: A for loop that iterates through the usernames in the access list
An if statement that compares a username to the criteria for removal
questions.explanation: The algorithm should iterate through the usernames in an access list. On each iteration, it should check whether the current username matches the specific criteria and remove it when it does. The if statement checks if the current username matches the specific criteria.

questions.question: 5. In the list [“elarson”, “bmoreno”, “tshah”, “eraab”], which element has an index of 3?
questions.explanation: In the list [“elarson”, “bmoreno”, “tshah”, “eraab”], the element “eraab” has an index of 3. In Python, indices start at 0, so the element that has an index of 3 is the fourth element.

questions.question: 1. Which regular expression symbol represents one or more occurrences of a specific character?
questions.explanation: The symbol + represents one or more occurrences of a specific character.

questions.question: 2. As a security analyst, you are responsible for finding employee IDs that end with the character and number sequence “a6v”. Given that employee IDs consist of both numbers and alphabetic characters and are at least four characters long, which regular expression pattern would you use?
questions.explanation: The regular expression “\w+a6v” matches strings that consist of both numbers and alphabetic characters, are at least four characters long, and end with the sequence “a6v”. There must be at least one other character before “a6v”, so “\w+” is needed to match to one or more alphanumeric characters. Then, the required ending sequence is “a6v”.

questions.question: 3. You have imported the re module into Python with the code import re. You want to use the findall() function to search through a string. Which function call enables you to search through the string contained in the variable text in order to return all matches to a regular expression stored in the variable pattern?
questions.explanation: The function call re.findall(pattern, text) enables you to do this. The re.findall() function returns a list of matches to a regular expression. You must specify that this function comes from the re module. The first argument is the regular expression pattern that you want to match. In this case, it is found in the variable pattern. The second argument indicates where to search for this pattern. In this case, this is the string assigned to the variable text.

questions.question: 4. Which of the following strings would Python return as matches to the regular expression pattern “\w+”? Select all that apply.
questions.explanation: The strings “3” and “FirstName” match the regular expression pattern “\w+”. The \w symbol matches with any alphanumeric character. When combined with the + symbol, it represents one or more occurrences of any alphanumeric character. Because “FirstName” is a string that contains multiple alphanumeric characters, it matches the regular expression.

questions.question: 5. Which string matches with the regular expression “b\wa+b”?
questions.explanation: The string “bkaab” matches with the regular expression “b\wa+b”. The first character must be “b”. After this, the symbol \w is used to match any alphanumeric character, including “k”. Next, the + symbol specifies that there should be one or more occurrences of the character it follows, which in this case is “a”. Finally, the string must end with “b”.

course: Course 7 – Automate Cybersecurity Tasks with Python

questions.question: 1. Which of the following potential signs of suspicious activity can you track with automated Python programs? Select all that apply.
choices: Whether login attempts occurred from IP addresses that are not established work zones
Whether login attempts occurred outside of normal work hours
Whether phishing attempts occurred through in-person interactions
Whether several failed login attempts occurred within a short span of time
correct_answers: Whether login attempts occurred from IP addresses that are not established work zones
Whether login attempts occurred outside of normal work hours
Whether several failed login attempts occurred within a short span of time
questions.explanation: Using automated Python programs, you can track whether several failed login attempts occurred within a short span of time, whether login attempts occurred outside of normal work hours, and whether login attempts occurred from IP addresses that are not established work zones. In all of these cases, you can obtain the data needed for Python automation.

questions.question: 2. Which Python component contributes to automation by allowing you to perform the same actions a certain number of times based on a sequence?
questions.explanation: Python for loops contribute to automation by allowing you to perform the same action a certain number of times based on a sequence.

questions.question: 3. Why is knowing how to work with files important for automation?
choices: Cybersecurity-related information is often found in log files.
In order to create a function, it’s necessary to incorporate a file into it.
String and list methods are only accessible through files.
It is necessary to save a file in order to review what you have automated.
correct_answers: Cybersecurity-related information is often found in log files.
questions.explanation: Knowing how to work with files is important for automation because cybersecurity-related information is often found in log files.

questions.question: 4. Which of the following are common file formats for security logs? Select all that apply.
questions.explanation: Common file formats for security logs include .txt and .csv. Both file formats are types of text files, meaning they only contain plain text. It is easy to extract data from .txt and .csv files.

questions.question: 5. What does the line of code with open(“ip_addresses.txt, “r”) as file: instruct Python to do? Select two answers.
choices: Open the “ip_addresses.txt” file in order to read it
Write the string “r” to the “ip_addresses.txt” file
Store the file object in the file variable while inside the with statement
correct_answers: Open the “ip_addresses.txt” file in order to read it
Store the file object in the file variable while inside the with statement
questions.explanation: The line of code with open(“ip_addresses.txt, “r”) as file: instructs Python to open the “ip_addresses.txt” file in order to read it (“r”). It also instructs Python to store the file object in the file variable while inside the with statement.

questions.question: 1. You want to open the file “logs.txt” and store it in the file variable for the purpose of reading it. You also want to ensure all resources are released and the file is closed after you read it. What is the correct line of code to do this?
questions.explanation: The code with open(“logs.txt”, “r”) as file: is the correct line of code to do this. The with keyword ensures all resources are released while opening and reading the file. This includes ensuring the file is closed after exiting the with statement. Then, calling the open() function with the file “logs.txt” and “r” as arguments indicates to read the “logs.txt” file. Finally, as file specifies to store the file object in the variable file.

questions.question: 2. After you’ve opened a log file as login_file, which line of code can you use to read the file and store it in a variable called login_attempts?
questions.explanation: The code login_attempts = login_file.read() reads the log file and stores it in a variable called login_attempts. The .read() method converts files into strings. The code assigns the string it creates to another variable named login_attempts.

questions.question: 3. You just read a log file into a variable called file. The file variable contains a string of multiple IP addresses that are each separated by a whitespace. Which line of code separates each individual IP address and stores it as a list in a variable called ip_addresses?
questions.explanation: The code ip_addresses = file.split() separates the individual IP addresses in the file variable and then stores this as a list in a variable called ip_addresses. The .split() method converts a string into a list. It separates the string based on a character passed into the function as an argument. If a character is not passed in, it will separate the string whenever it encounters a whitespace.

questions.question: 4. You need to check for unusual login activity. Specifically, you need to check a list of login timestamps to determine if any of the login times occurred at unusual hours. If you want to automate this through Python, what would be part of your code? Select two answers.
choices: An if statement that checks if the login timestamp occurred at unusual hours
A counter variable that keeps track of the number of failed login attempts
A for loop that iterates through the list of timestamps
An if statement that checks if a specific user has multiple login timestamps during unusual hours
correct_answers: An if statement that checks if the login timestamp occurred at unusual hours
A for loop that iterates through the list of timestamps
questions.explanation: The code should include a for loop that iterates through the list of timestamps and an if statement that checks if the login timestamp occurred at unusual hours.

questions.question: 1. What types of errors might you encounter while debugging code? Select three answers.
questions.explanation: Syntax errors, logic errors, and exceptions are all types of errors you might encounter while debugging code. Syntax errors involve invalid usage of the Python language. Logic errors may not cause error messages, but they produce unintended results. Exceptions happen when the program does not know how to execute code even though it is syntactically correct.

questions.question: 2. The purpose of this code is to indicate whether a particular operating system needs to be updated. However, it contains a syntax error. Run this code, analyze its output, and then debug it. (If you want to undo your changes to the code, you can click the Reset button.)
choices: Change the keyword elsif to elif.
Use single equals signs (=) and not double equals signs (==).
correct_answers: Change the keyword elsif to elif.
questions.explanation: When you run this code, the error message can help you identify the syntax error and the line number where it occurs. Changing the keyword elsif to elif will fix the error. Syntax errors involve invalid usage of the Python language, such as misspelling a keyword. The correct spelling for the keyword needed before the condition operating_system == “OS 2” is elif.

questions.question: Based on what you discover, how can you fix the error?
choices: Change the keyword elsif to elif.
Use single equals signs (=) and not double equals signs (==).
correct_answers: Change the keyword elsif to elif.
questions.explanation: When you run this code, the error message can help you identify the syntax error and the line number where it occurs. Changing the keyword elsif to elif will fix the error. Syntax errors involve invalid usage of the Python language, such as misspelling a keyword. The correct spelling for the keyword needed before the condition operating_system == “OS 2” is elif.

questions.question: 3. You have written code that assigns security incident tickets to the appropriate cybersecurity team based on its priority level. If the priority level is 1, it should get forwarded to Team A. If the priority level is 2, it should get forwarded to Team B. When testing your code, you notice that an incident with priority level 2 is forwarded to Team A instead of Team B. What type of error is this?
questions.explanation: This is a logic error. Logic errors are errors that result when the logic used in code produces unintended results. In this situation, because the security incident ticket is forwarded to the wrong team, there is an unintended result.

questions.question: 4. You have written code that uses a search algorithm to find an employee’s IP address. When testing your code, an error message indicates that an unknown index is being accessed. What type of error is this?
questions.explanation: This is an exception. Exceptions occur when Python does not know how to execute code even though it is syntactically correct. This happens if you ask Python to access an index that does not exist.

questions.question: 5. Which of the following are syntax errors? Select two answers.
choices: Typing < in a condition when <= is needed
Calling a function that has not been defined
Omitting the colon at the end of an iterative statement header
Misspelling the Python keyword elif by typing elsif instead
correct_answers: Omitting the colon at the end of an iterative statement header
Misspelling the Python keyword elif by typing elsif instead
questions.explanation: Omitting the colon at the end of an iterative statement header and misspelling the Python keyword elif by typing elsif instead are two examples of syntax errors. Syntax errors involve invalid usage of the Python language.

questions.question: 1. What are the three types of errors you will encounter while debugging?
choices: Syntax errors, exceptions, and comment errors
Syntax errors, logic errors, and exceptions
Logic errors, comment errors, and iterative errors
correct_answers: Syntax errors, logic errors, and exceptions

course: Course 7 – Automate Cybersecurity Tasks with Python

module: Module 1: Protect Data and Communicate Incidents

questions.question: 1. What does a security mindset enable a security analyst to do when protecting their organization? Select two answers.
choices: Evaluate risks and identify potential system breaches
Approve social media connections from security professionals
correct_answers: Evaluate risks and identify potential system breaches
questions.explanation: A security mindset enables an analyst to recognize what they are defending. It also helps them evaluate risks and identify potential system breaches.

questions.question: 2. Which type of asset would have the least impact on an organization if it were compromised?
questions.explanation: A guest Wi-Fi network is an asset that would have the least impact on an organization if it were compromised because an organization’s business operations would experience little to no impact.

questions.question: 3. How can security analysts cultivate a security mindset?
choices: By researching the latest security vulnerabilities
By sharing sensitive information with those who request it
By protecting public data from being accessed and shared
correct_answers: By researching the latest security vulnerabilities
questions.explanation: Security analysts can cultivate a security mindset by researching the latest security vulnerabilities. Staying updated about threats and vulnerabilities can help analysts take the necessary actions to prevent potential attacks from happening.

questions.question: 4. Which of the following examples describes the use of a security mindset? Select two answers.
choices: Downloading email attachments from unknown senders
Exercising suspicion before opening email attachments
correct_answers: Exercising suspicion before opening email attachments
questions.explanation: Exercising suspicion before opening email attachments and reporting suspicious emails are examples of the use of a security mindset. A security mindset can help you identify and reduce security risks and potential incidents.

questions.question: 1. A security analyst notices that an employee has installed an app on their work device without getting permission from the help desk. The log indicates that potentially malicious code might have been executed on the host. Which of these security events should the security analyst escalate to a supervisor?
choices: The log indicating malicious code might have been executed on the host should be escalated.
The employee installing an app without permission should be escalated.
questions.explanation: Both events should be escalated to a supervisor. There are no issues that are too small or too big. It’s always best to err on the side of caution and report events to the appropriate team members.

questions.question: 2. Which are types of data and assets that stakeholders are most interested in protecting? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Sensitive financial data and customers’ usernames and passwords are examples of data and assets that stakeholders are most interested in protecting.

questions.question: 3. Fill in the blank: When a security event results in a data breach, it is categorized as a _____.
questions.explanation: When a security event results in a data breach, it is categorized as a security incident. However, if the event is resolved without resulting in a breach, it is not considered an incident.

questions.question: 4. Which of the following are examples of the potential impact of a security incident involving malicious code? Select three answers.
questions.explanation: Operational downtime, financial consequences, and loss of assets are examples of the potential impact of a security incident involving malicious code.

questions.question: 1. As a security analyst, you are responsible for protecting an organization’s low-level assets and high-importance assets. Which of the following is considered a low-level asset?
questions.explanation: A security mindset helps analysts protect high-importance assets. A security mindset helps analysts protect low-level assets. A security mindset helps analysts protect all levels of assets. (CORRECT) A security mindset is not important for protecting assets.

questions.question: 2. Which of the following statements best describes the relationship between a security mindset and asset protection?
choices: A security mindset helps analysts protect high-importance assets.
A security mindset helps analysts protect low-level assets.
A security mindset helps analysts protect all levels of assets.
A security mindset is not important for protecting assets.
correct_answers: A security mindset helps analysts protect all levels of assets.
questions.explanation: Press releases (CORRECT) Passport numbers Product announcements (CORRECT) Health insurance information

questions.question: 3. Which of the following examples are considered public data? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: customer data (CORRECT) guest Wi-Fi job postings social media

questions.question: 4. Fill in the blank: One of the most important concerns for most organizations is the protection of _____.
questions.explanation: the analyst’s chance for a promotion the customers of the organization that hired the analyst (CORRECT) the financial markets competitors in the industry

questions.question: 5. Fill in the blank: The decisions a security analyst makes can affect the organization that the analyst works for and other team members across the organization. These decisions also affect ______.
choices: the analyst’s chance for a promotion
the customers of the organization that hired the analyst
correct_answers: the customers of the organization that hired the analyst
questions.explanation: Ignoring small events Reporting small events (CORRECT) Understanding the organization’s assets ( CORRECT) Paying attention to detail (CORRECT)

questions.question: 6. What are some ways that security analysts protect data? Select three answers.
questions.explanation: Phishing incident Compromised data Security incident (CORRECT) Data security event

questions.question: 7. What is the correct term for a security event that results in a data breach?
questions.explanation: private social media pages bank statements (CORRECT) social security numbers (CORRECT) website URLs

questions.question: 8. Fill in the blank: An organization is responsible for protecting its customers’ sensitive data. Examples of the kinds of sensitive data that must be protected include ____ and _____. Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Improved hardware functionality Regulatory fines (CORRECT) Significant reduction in employee retention Loss of credibility (CORRECT)

questions.question: 9. Which of the following are the best examples of possible consequences of a data breach? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Security analyst evaluation Security recognition Python knowledge Security mindset (CORRECT)

questions.question: 10. Which concept focuses on understanding how to evaluate risk and identify the potential for a breach of a system, application, or data?
questions.explanation: financial information guest Wi-Fi network (CORRECT) company job descriptions trade secrets

questions.question: 11. Fill in the blank: Entry-level analysts can help protect low-level assets, such as an organization’s _____.
questions.explanation: Competitors in the same industry The financial markets The customers of the organization that hired you (CORRECT) The organization that hired you (CORRECT)

questions.question: 12. Who will be affected by the decisions you make as a security analyst? Select two answers.
choices: The customers of the organization that hired you
correct_answers: The customers of the organization that hired you
questions.explanation: Employee salaries An organization’s termination policy An organization’s social media page Sensitive customer data (CORRECT)

questions.question: 13. Fill in the blank: _____ must be protected at all times. An organization can lose its credibility with its customers if it is not properly protected.
questions.explanation: ability to help an organization’s human resources (HR) department remain compliant at all times intent to provide quality security services to an organization’s development operations team opportunity to showcase your Linux and other coding related technical skills ability to evaluate risk and constantly seek out and identify the potential or actual breach of a system, application, or data (CORRECT)

questions.question: 14. Fill in the blank: A security mindset is the _____.
choices: ability to help an organization’s human resources (HR) department remain compliant at all times
intent to provide quality security services to an organization’s development operations team
opportunity to showcase your Linux and other coding related technical skills
ability to evaluate risk and constantly seek out and identify the potential or actual breach of a system, application, or data
correct_answers: ability to evaluate risk and constantly seek out and identify the potential or actual breach of a system, application, or data
questions.explanation: Company job descriptions Public press releases Guest Wi-Fi network Intellectual property (CORRECT)

questions.question: 15. As a security analyst, you are responsible for protecting an organization’s low-level assets and high-level assets. Which of the following is considered a high-level asset?
questions.explanation: Social media influencers Web programmers HIPAA compliance officers Stakeholders (CORRECT)

questions.question: 16. Fill in the blank: _____ are interested in protecting sensitive financial data, customers’ usernames and passwords, and third-party vendor security.
questions.explanation: Credit card numbers (CORRECT) Product announcements Newsletters Passwords (CORRECT)

questions.question: 17. What are some examples of the customer data that security analysts protect? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: A breach that disrupts the physical security of an organization A security event that does not result in a data breach A security event that results in a data breach (CORRECT) A breach that disrupts the cloud security of an organization

questions.question: 18. Which of the following defines a security incident?
choices: A breach that disrupts the physical security of an organization
A security event that does not result in a data breach
A security event that results in a data breach
A breach that disrupts the cloud security of an organization
correct_answers: A security event that results in a data breach
questions.explanation: The resignation of the company’s social media manager Employee security awareness training A data breach (CORRECT) A cybersecurity awareness month phishing program

questions.question: 19. Which of the following can cause a company to experience loss of credibility, financial loss, or regulatory fines?
choices: The resignation of the company’s social media manager
A cybersecurity awareness month phishing program
questions.explanation: Seek engineering mentors Evaluate risks (CORRECT) Work various security jobs with different organizations Escalate major security issues within one week

questions.question: 20. Which of the following is an essential way to maintain a security mindset?
choices: Work various security jobs with different organizations
Escalate major security issues within one week
questions.explanation: Intellectual property (CORRECT) Sensitive customer data (CORRECT) Network equipment Financial information (CORRECT)

questions.question: 21. Which of the following assets can be protected by adopting a security mindset? Select three answers.
questions.explanation: Customer bank account information Government trade agreements Employee identification numbers (CORRECT) Employee email addresses (CORRECT)

questions.question: 22. Which of the following are examples of private data? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Data managers Stakeholders (CORRECT) Information protection advisors Executive security administrators

questions.question: 23. What term is used to describe individuals of an organization who are interested in protecting sensitive financial data, customers’ usernames and passwords, and third-party vendor security?
questions.explanation: sometimes rarely always (CORRECT) never

questions.question: 24. Fill in the blank: A security analyst should _____ escalate potential security events.
questions.explanation: reinforce the expectations of security stakeholders apply for an engineering role recognize the difference between physical security and cybersecurity defend against constant pressure from cyber attackers (CORRECT)

questions.question: 25. Fill in the blank: A security mindset helps a security analyst _____.
choices: reinforce the expectations of security stakeholders
recognize the difference between physical security and cybersecurity
defend against constant pressure from cyber attackers
correct_answers: defend against constant pressure from cyber attackers
questions.explanation: Public data Sensitive data (CORRECT) Confidential data Private data

questions.question: 26. An employee at a healthcare company accesses a patient’s medical history and payment information to provide treatment. Which type of data is this classified as?
questions.explanation: Public shame Unsuccessful marketing campaigns Cancellation of holiday work events Financial loss (CORRECT)

questions.question: 27. Fill in the blank: ____ can occur if an organization’s data and essential assets are compromised in a way that disrupts its business operations.
questions.explanation: In conclusion, this comprehensive overview has provided valuable insights into various aspects of the cybersecurity domain. From foundational knowledge about operating systems and network security to advanced topics such as incident response and machine learning, participants have gained a well-rounded understanding of the multifaceted field of cybersecurity. The diverse range of courses covered in this program equips learners with essential skills, from using Linux and Python in cybersecurity tasks to mastering incident detection and response techniques. By delving into the intricacies of threat modeling, network analysis, and the utilization of cybersecurity tools, participants are well-prepared to navigate the challenges of the cybersecurity landscape. The emphasis on hands-on experience, practical demonstrations, and real-world applications ensures that learners not only grasp theoretical concepts but also develop the practical skills necessary for success in cybersecurity roles. Overall, this program serves as a comprehensive and indispensable resource for those looking to embark on or advance in a cybersecurity career, offering a robust foundation and practical insights into the dynamic and ever-evolving field of cybersecurity.

course: Course 8 – Put It to Work: Prepare for Cybersecurity Jobs

questions.question: 1. Fill in the blank: A malware infection is an incident type that occurs when _____.
choices: a computer’s speed and performance improves
an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies
a website experiences high traffic volumes
malicious software designed to disrupt a system infiltrates an organization’s computers or network
correct_answers: malicious software designed to disrupt a system infiltrates an organization’s computers or network
questions.explanation: an employee that runs an organization’s public relations posts incorrect data on the company’s social media page an individual gains digital or physical access to a system or application without permission malicious software designed to disrupt a system infiltrates an organization’s computers or network. an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies (CORRECT) Improper usage is an incident type that occurs when an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies.

questions.question: 2. Fill in the blank: Improper usage is an incident type that occurs when _____.
choices: an employee that runs an organization’s public relations posts incorrect data on the company’s social media page
an individual gains digital or physical access to a system or application without permission
malicious software designed to disrupt a system infiltrates an organization’s computers or network.
an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies
correct_answers: an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies
questions.explanation: Improper usage is an incident type that occurs when an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies.

questions.question: 3. When should you escalate improper usage to a supervisor?
choices: Improper usage incidents should always be escalated out of caution.
Improper usage incidents should be escalated if there is a high level of improper usage.
Improper usage attempts that affect high-priority assets should be escalated; other improper usage instances are not as important.
Improper usage does not need to be escalated because these are in-house scenarios that can be handled without reporting them to the security team.
correct_answers: Improper usage incidents should always be escalated out of caution.
questions.explanation: Improper usage should always be escalated.

questions.question: 4. Fill in the blank: Unauthorized access is an incident type that occurs when _____.
choices: malicious software designed to disrupt a system infiltrates an organization’s computers or network
an employee of an organization violates the organization’s acceptable use policies
an individual gains digital or physical access to a system, data, or an application without permission
an authorized employee sends a job description to a friend before the job description has been released to the public
Unauthorized access is an incident type that occurs when an individual gains digital or physical access to a system, data, or an application without permission.
correct_answers: an individual gains digital or physical access to a system, data, or an application without permission
questions.explanation: True False (CORRECT) Not all security incidents should be escalated. However, most should be escalated and some are more urgent than others.

questions.question: 1. All security incidents should be escalated.
questions.explanation: Not all security incidents should be escalated. However, most should be escalated and some are more urgent than others.

questions.question: 2. You’ve recently been hired as a cybersecurity analyst for an office supply organization.  Which incident can have the most impact on the organization’s operations?
choices: The organization’s guest Wi-Fi network is down
An employee forgets their login credentials
The organization’s manufacturing network is compromised
A user’s social media profile has the wrong birthday displayed
correct_answers: The organization’s manufacturing network is compromised
questions.explanation: A manufacturing network is a major part of an organization’s business operations. If it is compromised, it can lead to major financial loss.

questions.question: 3. Fill in the blank: A(n) _____ is a set of actions that outlines who should be notified when an incident alert occurs and how that incident should be handled.
questions.explanation: An escalation policy is a set of actions that outlines who should be notified when an incident alert occurs and how that incident should be handled.

questions.question: 4. Which incident classification type occurs when an employee violates an organization’s acceptable use policy?
questions.explanation: The improper usage incident classification type occurs when an employee violates the organization’s acceptable use policy.

questions.question: 1. What security term describes the identification of a potential security event, triaging it, and handing it off to a more experienced team member?
questions.explanation: Leadership Graphics design Attention to detail (CORRECT) Linux operations

questions.question: 2. Fill in the blank: _____ is a skill that will help you identify security incidents that need to be escalated.
questions.explanation: Public press releases Company job descriptions Phishing attempts Incident classification types (CORRECT)

questions.question: 3. What elements of security do terms like unauthorized access, malware infections, and improper usage describe?
questions.explanation: Phishing Unauthorized access Malware infection Improper usage (CORRECT)

questions.question: 4. Which incident type involves an employee violating an organization’s acceptable use policy?
questions.explanation: An employee forgets their password and logs too many failed login attempts A system containing customer PII is compromised (CORRECT) The guest Wi-Fi network for a company is hacked A company’s social media account is compromised

questions.question: 5. Which of the following security incidents can have the most damaging impact to an organization?
choices: An employee forgets their password and logs too many failed login attempts
A system containing customer PII is compromised
The guest Wi-Fi network for a company is hacked
A company’s social media account is compromised
correct_answers: A system containing customer PII is compromised
questions.explanation: Email the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) of the company for clarification. Identify the importance of the assets affected by the security incident. (CORRECT) Reach out to the organization’s Red Team supervisor to determine urgency. Contact the risk assessment team to determine urgency.

questions.question: 6. What is the best way to determine the urgency of a security incident?
choices: Email the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) of the company for clarification.
Identify the importance of the assets affected by the security incident.
Reach out to the organization’s Red Team supervisor to determine urgency.
Contact the risk assessment team to determine urgency.
correct_answers: Identify the importance of the assets affected by the security incident.
questions.explanation: A vulnerability scan system A security risk assessor A network architecture alert An escalation policy (CORRECT)

questions.question: 7. What security term is defined as a set of actions that outlines who should be notified when an incident alert occurs?
questions.explanation: An escalation policy can help analysts prioritize which security events need to be escalated with more or less urgency. (CORRECT) An escalation policy can help analysts determine the best way to cross-collaborate with other members of their organization. An escalation policy instructs analysts on the right person to contact during an incident. (CORRECT) An escalation policy can help analysts determine which tools to use to solve an issue.

questions.question: 8. Why is it important for analysts to follow a company’s escalation policy? Select two answers.
choices: An escalation policy can help analysts prioritize which security events need to be escalated with more or less urgency.
An escalation policy can help analysts determine the best way to cross-collaborate with other members of their organization.
An escalation policy instructs analysts on the right person to contact during an incident.
An escalation policy can help analysts determine which tools to use to solve an issue.
correct_answers: An escalation policy can help analysts prioritize which security events need to be escalated with more or less urgency.
An escalation policy instructs analysts on the right person to contact during an incident.
questions.explanation: They will learn when and how to escalate security incidents. (CORRECT) They will learn the best way to create visual dashboards to communicate with executives. They will learn how to use the Linux operating system. They will learn the best way to communicate with stakeholders.

questions.question: 9. A new security analyst has just been hired to an organization and is advised to read through the company’s escalation policy. What kind of information will the analyst be educated on when reading through this policy?
choices: They will learn when and how to escalate security incidents.
They will learn the best way to create visual dashboards to communicate with executives.
They will learn how to use the Linux operating system. They will learn the best way to communicate with stakeholders.
correct_answers: They will learn when and how to escalate security incidents.
questions.explanation: Excellent communication skills Ability to follow an organization’s escalation guidelines or processes (CORRECT) Ability to collaborate well with others Attention to detail (CORRECT)

questions.question: 10. Which skills will help you identify security incidents that need to be escalated? Select two answers.
choices: Ability to follow an organization’s escalation guidelines or processes
Ability to collaborate well with others
correct_answers: Ability to follow an organization’s escalation guidelines or processes
questions.explanation: Gift card scam Unauthorized access (CORRECT) SPAM Malware infection (CORRECT)

questions.question: 11. As a security analyst, you might be asked to escalate various incidents. Which of the following are common incident classification types? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Unauthorized access Improper usage (CORRECT) Social engineering Malware infection

questions.question: 12. An employee attempting to access software on their work device for personal use can be an example of what security incident type?
questions.explanation: The third-party assessment team might be removed by the organization. Small incidents rarely have any impact on an organization. The organization might need to delete its social media profile. It can become a bigger threat. (CORRECT)

questions.question: 13. A security analyst for an organization notices unusual log activity in an app that was recently banned from the organization. However, the analyst forgets to escalate this activity to the proper personnel. What potential impact can this small incident have on the organization?
choices: The third-party assessment team might be removed by the organization.
Small incidents rarely have any impact on an organization.
The organization might need to delete its social media profile.
It can become a bigger threat.
correct_answers: It can become a bigger threat.
questions.explanation: An escalation policy educates analysts on how to be aware of phishing attempts. An escalation policy outlines who should be notified when an incident occurs. (CORRECT) An escalation policy instructs the analysts on how to scan for vulnerabilities. An escalation policy outlines when to alert the public of a data breach.

questions.question: 14. How can an escalation policy help security analysts do their jobs?
choices: An escalation policy educates analysts on how to be aware of phishing attempts.
An escalation policy outlines who should be notified when an incident occurs.
An escalation policy instructs the analysts on how to scan for vulnerabilities.
An escalation policy outlines when to alert the public of a data breach.
correct_answers: An escalation policy outlines who should be notified when an incident occurs.
questions.explanation: Every company has a different escalation policy, and it is an analyst’s job to ensure incidents are handled correctly. (CORRECT) The escalation policy will help you with vulnerability scanning. The policy will help you analyze data logs. The policy will advise you on who to report to each day.

questions.question: 15. You have recently been hired as a security analyst for an organization. You previously worked at another company doing security, and you were very familiar with their escalation policy. Why would it be important for you to learn your new company’s escalation policy?
choices: Every company has a different escalation policy, and it is an analyst’s job to ensure incidents are handled correctly.
The escalation policy will help you with vulnerability scanning.
The policy will help you analyze data logs.
The policy will advise you on who to report to each day.
correct_answers: Every company has a different escalation policy, and it is an analyst’s job to ensure incidents are handled correctly.
questions.explanation: escalation policy (CORRECT) blue team CIRT guideline executive security dashboard employee security handbook

questions.question: 16. Fill in the blank: A/An _____ will help an entry-level analyst to know when and how to escalate a security incident.
questions.explanation: An employee having a phone conversation about a work project in the breakroom Unauthorized access to a manufacturing application (CORRECT) An employee sends an email to the wrong colleague An employee’s account flagged for multiple login attempts

questions.question: 17. Which of the following security incidents is likely to have the most negative impact on an organization?
choices: An employee having a phone conversation about a work project in the breakroom
Unauthorized access to a manufacturing application
An employee sends an email to the wrong colleague
An employee’s account flagged for multiple login attempts
correct_answers: Unauthorized access to a manufacturing application
questions.explanation: mismanagement of funds missing software noncompliance of tax laws improper usage (CORRECT)

questions.question: 18. Fill in the blank: Entry-level analysts might need to escalate various incident types, including _____.
questions.explanation: The best thing to do is escalate the incident that your supervisor advised you to escalate first. The incident involving the malicious actor who has gained unauthorized access to the manufacturing application should be escalated first. (CORRECT) The incident involving the employee who is unable to log in to their account should be escalated first. Both security incidents should be escalated at the same time.

questions.question: 19. You are alerted that a hacker has gained unauthorized access to one of your organization’s manufacturing applications. At the same time, an employee’s account has been flagged for multiple failed login attempts. Which incident should be escalated first?
choices: The best thing to do is escalate the incident that your supervisor advised you to escalate first.
The incident involving the malicious actor who has gained unauthorized access to the manufacturing application should be escalated first.
The incident involving the employee who is unable to log in to their account should be escalated first.
Both security incidents should be escalated at the same time.
correct_answers: The incident involving the malicious actor who has gained unauthorized access to the manufacturing application should be escalated first.
questions.explanation: The company can suffer a financial loss. (CORRECT) The company can suffer a loss in reputation. (CORRECT) The company’s antivirus software can be uninstalled. The company’s employee retention percentage can decrease drastically.

questions.question: 20. What is a potential negative consequence of not properly escalating a small security incident? Select two answers.
choices: The company can suffer a financial loss.
The company can suffer a loss in reputation.
The company’s antivirus software can be uninstalled.
The company’s employee retention percentage can decrease drastically.
correct_answers: The company can suffer a financial loss.
The company can suffer a loss in reputation.
questions.explanation: less equally marginally more (CORRECT)

questions.question: 21. Unauthorized access to a system with PII is _____ critical than an employee’s account being flagged for multiple failed login attempts.
questions.explanation: properly assessing security events reporting a security incident to a human resource department for compliance purposes identifying a potential security incident, triaging it, and handing it off to a more experienced team member (CORRECT) creating a visual dashboard that shows security stakeholders the amount of security incidents taking place

questions.question: 22. Fill in the blank: Incident escalation is the process of _____.
choices: reporting a security incident to a human resource department for compliance purposes
identifying a potential security incident, triaging it, and handing it off to a more experienced team member
creating a visual dashboard that shows security stakeholders the amount of security incidents taking place
correct_answers: identifying a potential security incident, triaging it, and handing it off to a more experienced team member
questions.explanation: moderate minimal lower higher (CORRECT)

questions.question: 23. Fill in the blank: Security incidents involving the PII of customers should be escalated with a ____ level of urgency compared to incidents that do not involve customer PII.
questions.explanation: Working remotely Delegating tasks Attention to detail (CORRECT) Reading quickly

questions.question: 24. Fill in the blank: _____ is important when following a company’s escalation policy to ensure you follow the policy correctly.
questions.explanation: Communicate a potential security incident to a more experienced team member (CORRECT) Make reactive decisions Maintain data logs that detail previous security events Create a visual dashboard that details a solution to the security problem

questions.question: 25. Which of the following is an essential part of incident escalation?
choices: Communicate a potential security incident to a more experienced team member
Maintain data logs that detail previous security events
Create a visual dashboard that details a solution to the security problem
correct_answers: Communicate a potential security incident to a more experienced team member
questions.explanation: how to manage the security stakeholders of an organization how to escalate customer service complaints how to handle a security incident alert (CORRECT) how to defend an organization’s data and assets

questions.question: 26. Fill in the blank: An escalation policy is a set of actions that outlines _____.
choices: how to manage the security stakeholders of an organization
how to escalate customer service complaints
how to handle a security incident alert
how to defend an organization’s data and assets
correct_answers: how to handle a security incident alert
questions.explanation: In conclusion, this module serves as a vital exploration into incident prioritization and escalation, providing participants with a deep understanding of their pivotal roles in cybersecurity. Armed with this knowledge, learners are equipped to navigate the dynamic challenges of incident management. The insights gained into decision-making processes, severity assessment, and escalation procedures contribute to the development of well-rounded cybersecurity professionals. As participants conclude this segment, they emerge with the expertise necessary to uphold the security posture of organizations and effectively respond to diverse cybersecurity incidents, ensuring the continued resilience of business operations.

course: Course 8 – Put It to Work: Prepare for Cybersecurity Jobs

module: Module 3: Communicate Effectively to Influence Stakeholders

questions.question: 1. Which of the following are stakeholder communication best practices? Select all that apply.
choices: They should be urgent in order to gain the stakeholders’ attention.
They should have a clear purpose
correct_answers: They should have a clear purpose
questions.explanation: Communications with stakeholders should be precise, avoid unnecessary technical terms, and have a clear purpose.

questions.question: 2. Fill in the blank: Information that is communicated to stakeholders is _____.
questions.explanation: Information that is communicated to stakeholders is sensitive. It is important to be cautious when exchanging emails with stakeholders. Always make sure you are sending emails to the correct address.

questions.question: 3. What actions can a security analyst take to learn what matters to the stakeholders they communicate with?
choices: Send emails to the same stakeholder throughout the day to learn which email the stakeholder responds to.
Wait for the stakeholders to provide information about what matters to them.
Ask stakeholders questions about the data and assets they are responsible for protecting.
Reach out to the stakeholders’ immediate supervisor for better clarity on the needs of the stakeholders.
correct_answers: Ask stakeholders questions about the data and assets they are responsible for protecting.
questions.explanation: Asking stakeholders questions about the data and assets they are responsible for protecting is a great way to learn what matters most to them. Directly asking the stakeholders what data and assets they are responsible for protecting gives more personal insight into their technological needs and prompts a more immediate response from them.

questions.question: 4. Fill in the blank: Graphs, charts, videos, and dashboards are examples of _____ communications that are created to provide and compare important data and metrics with stakeholders.
questions.explanation: Graphs, charts, videos, and dashboards are examples of visual communications. Visual communications are helpful in situations where various numbers and data sets are being compared or reviewed.

questions.question: 5. Which of the following are concise, effective communication methods for conveying key details to stakeholders? Select two answers.
questions.explanation: Visual presentations and emails can be used to effectively convey key details to stakeholders.

questions.question: 1. Which of the following should a security analyst do before communicating the results of a vulnerability test to stakeholders? Select three answers.
choices: Consider the nature of the information that is being communicated
correct_answers: Consider the nature of the information that is being communicated
questions.explanation: A security analyst should choose an appropriate communications medium, consider the nature of the information that is being communicated, and use visual aids before communicating the results of a vulnerability test to stakeholders.

questions.question: 2. If a stakeholder fails to respond to an email in a timely manner, which communication steps are the next best options? Select two answers.
choices: Report to the organization’s Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)
questions.explanation: Sometimes an instant message or phone call can help move a situation forward. Direct communication is often better than waiting too long for an email response to a situation that needs immediate attention.

questions.question: 3. Fill in the blank: The use of _____ to tell a security story can help security analysts communicate impactful data and metrics.
questions.explanation: The use of visuals to tell a security story can help security analysts communicate impactful data and metrics. Charts and graphs are particularly effective because they can be used to compare data points or show small parts of a larger issue.

questions.question: 4. Which software programs can be used as tools for sharing and telling a visual story about data? Select all that apply.
questions.explanation: Google Sheets and Apache OpenOffice are both platforms that can be used to create and share visual stories of data.

questions.question: 5. There are many instances where a member of a cybersecurity team will need to create a visual dashboard to communicate impactful data and metrics to stakeholders. Which of the following programs can be used to create visual dashboards that can communicate impactful data and metrics to stakeholders? Select all that apply.
questions.explanation: Apache OpenOffice and Google Sheets are no cost options that allow users to create spreadsheets and other visual presentations.

questions.question: 1. Which of the following are stakeholders interested in having knowledge of? Select two answers.
choices: The decisions of their organization’s leadership
The online reviews for their organization
Social media reviews for their competitor’s organization
correct_answers: The decisions of their organization’s leadership
questions.explanation: Risk managers (CORRECT) Chief Information Security Officers (CISOs) (CORRECT) Help desk analysts Operations Managers (CORRECT)

questions.question: 2. Which individuals are considered security stakeholders? Select three answers.
questions.explanation: negative social media reviews security threats ( CORRECT) equipment failures failed tax audits

questions.question: 3. Fill in the blank: Security operations managers are primarily responsible for helping to identify and safeguard an organization from _____.
questions.explanation: It is proprietary. It is publicly available. It is sensitive. (CORRECT) It is shareable to the entire organization.

questions.question: 4. Which of the following statements best describes the information that is communicated to stakeholders?
choices: It is shareable to the entire organization.
questions.explanation: Be precise (CORRECT) Include as many topics as possible Use technical security terms as much as possible Avoid unnecessary technical terms (CORRECT)

questions.question: 5. Which of the following guidelines can help security analysts improve stakeholder communications? Select two answers.
choices: Include as many topics as possible
Use technical security terms as much as possible
questions.explanation: Lack of employee retention Negative social media reviews Negative publicity about non-security related issues that has been posted on the internet Malicious code detected in logs (CORRECT)

questions.question: 6. Which potential security challenges should a security analyst communicate to security stakeholders?
choices: Negative publicity about non-security related issues that has been posted on the internet
questions.explanation: visual (CORRECT) audio simple complex

questions.question: 7. Fill in the blank: Creating ____ communications allows a security stakeholder to view representations of what is being explained using graphs and charts.
questions.explanation: Visuals can help an analyst determine which tool to use to solve a security challenge. Visuals can help an analyst identify which details are most important for different stakeholders. Visuals can help an analyst communicate impactful metrics and data. (CORRECT) Visuals can help an analyst prioritize which incidents need to be escalated with more or less urgency.

questions.question: 8. Why is it important for analysts to use visuals to tell a security story?
choices: Visuals can help an analyst determine which tool to use to solve a security challenge.
Visuals can help an analyst identify which details are most important for different stakeholders.
Visuals can help an analyst communicate impactful metrics and data.
Visuals can help an analyst prioritize which incidents need to be escalated with more or less urgency.
correct_answers: Visuals can help an analyst communicate impactful metrics and data.
questions.explanation: leave requests publicly available information sensitive information (CORRECT) nonsensitive information

questions.question: 9. Fill in the blank: In the field of security, ______should always be communicated with care.
questions.explanation: A follow-up investigation An email to the CISO A phone call (CORRECT) A follow-up email to the stakeholder’s supervisor

questions.question: 10. Stakeholders have many responsibilities, so they might miss an email or fail to respond promptly. If an analyst needs to reach a stakeholder right away, what might be a better option for stakeholder communication?
choices: A follow-up email to the stakeholder’s supervisor
questions.explanation: An individual or a group that manages the public relations crisis for an organization An individual or a group that has an interest in any decision or activity of an organization (CORRECT) The security professionals who manage the SOC operations for an organization A customer who depends on an organization to protect their sensitive financial and medical data

questions.question: 11. What is a stakeholder?
choices: An individual or a group that manages the public relations crisis for an organization
An individual or a group that has an interest in any decision or activity of an organization
The security professionals who manage the SOC operations for an organization
A customer who depends on an organization to protect their sensitive financial and medical data
correct_answers: An individual or a group that has an interest in any decision or activity of an organization
questions.explanation: have a clear purpose (CORRECT) have various purposes to maximize time tell an elaborate story to ensure your point is made include numerous security questions

questions.question: 12. Fill in the blank: Communications with stakeholders should always be precise, avoid unnecessary technical terms, and _____.
choices: have various purposes to maximize time
tell an elaborate story to ensure your point is made
questions.explanation: graphs and charts (CORRECT) logs and alerts text-filled documents and graphs text messages and charts

questions.question: 13. Fill in the blank: Visual communications to stakeholders can be used to convey key details in the form of ____.
questions.explanation: Ask stakeholders to report their findings Use visuals to tell a security story (CORRECT) Collaborate with the publicity team to develop a communication strategy Request that the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) sends a summary email

questions.question: 14. An analyst finishes an incident review. Next, they want to clearly communicate meaningful data from their findings. What action can they take to share this information?
choices: Ask stakeholders to report their findings
Use visuals to tell a security story
Collaborate with the publicity team to develop a communication strategy
Request that the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) sends a summary email
correct_answers: Use visuals to tell a security story
questions.explanation: graphs and charts supervision a low level of urgency care (CORRECT)

questions.question: 15. Fill in the blank: For security purposes, it is important to communicate sensitive information with _____.
questions.explanation: Audit specialist Incident response manager Stakeholder (CORRECT) Decision-making manager

questions.question: 16. What term is used to define an individual or a group that has an interest in the decisions or activities of an organization?
questions.explanation: Risks (CORRECT) Vulnerabilities (CORRECT) The use of social media on work devices A lack of an employee consortium

questions.question: 17. A security operations manager often works directly with a security analyst as the first line of defense to protect an organization from what challenges? Select two answers.
choices: The use of social media on work devices
A lack of an employee consortium
questions.explanation: an organization’s competitors the general public stakeholders (CORRECT) employees regarding social events

questions.question: 18. Fill in the blank: Information that is communicated to ____ is considered sensitive.
questions.explanation: With a corporate-wide email With a letter to HR With a dashboard visualization Clearly, concisely, and quickly (CORRECT)

questions.question: 19. You are alerted that a malicious actor has gained unauthorized access to one of your organization’s manufacturing applications. You need to inform the operations manager as soon as possible. What is the best way to communicate this information?
questions.explanation: complex audio simple visual (CORRECT)

questions.question: 20. Fill in the blank: Creating ____ communications allows a security stakeholder to view representations of what is being explained using graphs and charts.
questions.explanation: Use visuals, such as charts and graphs, to tell the security story (CORRECT) Call the stakeholder and directly update them Ask your supervisor to report your findings because you are new Send an email that explains the necessary information

questions.question: 21. You have recently been hired as a security analyst for an organization. You’ve been asked by a security stakeholder to provide information on how often the employees from various departments are clicking on simulated phishing emails. What action can you take to best communicate this information?
choices: Use visuals, such as charts and graphs, to tell the security story
Call the stakeholder and directly update them
Ask your supervisor to report your findings because you are new
Send an email that explains the necessary information
correct_answers: Use visuals, such as charts and graphs, to tell the security story
questions.explanation: Send them an instant message (CORRECT) File a complaint with human resources Report the issue to your supervisor Call them on the phone (CORRECT)

questions.question: 22. What is the best way to follow-up with a stakeholder who has not immediately responded to your email? Select two answers.
choices: File a complaint with human resources
Report the issue to your supervisor
questions.explanation: Malicious code detected in logs (CORRECT) The resignation of a human resources employee Incorrect office hours posted on social media A tax audit

questions.question: 24. Which of the following is an example of a security event that should be communicated to a stakeholder?
choices: The resignation of a human resources employee
Incorrect office hours posted on social media
questions.explanation: Operations manager (CORRECT) Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) Chief Financial Security Officer (CFO) Entry-level security analyst

questions.question: 25. Handling the daily maintenance of security operations is the general responsibility for which security stakeholder?
questions.explanation: Chief Financial Security Officer (CFO) Risk manager (CORRECT) Operations manager Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)

questions.question: 26. Which security stakeholder helps recognize risks and manage the response to security incidents?
questions.explanation: Wait until a more experienced team member notices it Report the incident directly to the CISO Communicate the incident to a security stakeholder (CORRECT) Handle the incident using your Linux knowledge

questions.question: 27. Which of the following options is the best way to handle the detection of malicious code in logs?
choices: Wait until a more experienced team member notices it
Report the incident directly to the CISO
Communicate the incident to a security stakeholder
Handle the incident using your Linux knowledge
correct_answers: Communicate the incident to a security stakeholder
questions.explanation: In conclusion, this comprehensive journey through the diverse realms of cybersecurity has equipped participants with a multifaceted skill set essential for navigating the complexities of the digital landscape. From foundational knowledge in network security and operating systems to the intricacies of incident detection, response, and stakeholder communication, learners have gained valuable insights and practical expertise. The emphasis on hands-on experiences, real-world applications, and engagement with cutting-edge tools ensures that participants not only comprehend theoretical concepts but also develop the proficiency to address the dynamic challenges of cybersecurity in professional settings. As they embark on applying these acquired skills, participants are well-positioned to contribute effectively to the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity.

course: Course 8 – Put It to Work: Prepare for Cybersecurity Jobs

module: Module 4: Engage with The Cybersecurity Community

questions.question: 1. Which of the following methods can be used to build your cybersecurity network? Select three answers.
choices: Research the latest threats and vulnerabilities.
Connect with security professionals using social media.
correct_answers: Connect with security professionals using social media.
questions.explanation: Connecting with security professionals using social media, attending cybersecurity conferences, and joining cybersecurity associations are methods that can be used to build your cybersecurity network.

questions.question: 2. Fill in the blank: A security professional can sign up for _____ to keep up with key trends and topics in the industry.
questions.explanation: A security professional can sign up for security mailing lists to keep up with key trends and topics in the industry.

questions.question: 3. Which of the following strategies can an aspiring security analyst use to connect with security professionals? Select two answers.
choices: Leverage professional social media sites such as LinkedIn®.
correct_answers: Leverage professional social media sites such as LinkedIn®.
questions.explanation: Aspiring security analysts can connect with other security professionals by leveraging professional social media sites such as LinkedIn® and joining security associations.

questions.question: 4. How can engaging with the security community help newcomers establish a security career? Select two answers.
choices: By focusing on improving technical skills
By connecting with other security professionals
By staying informed about the latest security news
By engaging in unethical security activities
correct_answers: By connecting with other security professionals
By staying informed about the latest security news
questions.explanation: Engaging with the security community helps newcomers establish a security career by staying informed about the latest security news and connecting with other security professionals.

questions.question: 1. Fill in the blank: The OWASP is a standard awareness document that lists the top _____most critical security risks to web applications.
questions.explanation: Security from Kreb’s Point of View Krebs on Security (CORRECT) Security Investigation by Krebs The Washington Post Security Guide

questions.question: 2. Fill in the blank:  ____ is a security website that covers security news and investigations into cyber attacks.
choices: Security from Kreb’s Point of View
questions.explanation: CSO Online (CORRECT) Krebs Knows Security Krebs, the Security Research Expert Cybershield Chronicles

questions.question: 3. Continuing your security education demonstrates your willingness to remain current on what’s happening in the security industry. Which of the following sites provides news, analysis, and research on various security topics?
questions.explanation: Dark Reading (CORRECT) Krebs on Security CSO Online Kreb’s Cloud Security Blog

questions.question: 4. Fill in the blank: Although many security websites and blogs provide different relevant security tips, _____ specifically provides information on analytics and application security, mobile and cloud security, and the Internet of Things (IoT).
questions.explanation: Staying away from social media Asking friends and family members who are not in the security industry Utilizing your technical security terms as much as possible Finding them on social media (CORRECT)

questions.question: 5. Which of the following is a great way to connect with other security professionals in the industry?
choices: Asking friends and family members who are not in the security industry
Utilizing your technical security terms as much as possible
questions.explanation: Responding to unfamiliar messages Reading and commenting on the social media posts of leaders in the security industry (CORRECT) Reading CISO posts on social media Attempting to hack a security team member and resolving that hack in a timely fashion

questions.question: 6. Fill in the blank: _____ is a great way to connect with security professionals on social media.
choices: Reading and commenting on the social media posts of leaders in the security industry
Reading CISO posts on social media
Attempting to hack a security team member and resolving that hack in a timely fashion
correct_answers: Reading and commenting on the social media posts of leaders in the security industry
questions.explanation: Send multiple messages to a company on their social media page and ask how to contact their CISO directly Conduct an internet search for the name of the CISO of an organization (CORRECT) Ask friends in the e-commerce industry about which CISOs to follow Conduct a background check on CISOs in your area

questions.question: 7. Which of the following is a good first step to finding a CISO to follow on social media?
choices: Send multiple messages to a company on their social media page and ask how to contact their CISO directly
Conduct an internet search for the name of the CISO of an organization
Ask friends in the e-commerce industry about which CISOs to follow
Conduct a background check on CISOs in your area
correct_answers: Conduct an internet search for the name of the CISO of an organization
questions.explanation: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) product engineering Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity (CORRECT) Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) social media Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) Python

questions.question: 8. On social networks like LinkedIn®, you can find security professionals by searching for “cybersecurity analysts” or a similar search term. After this search, what is the best way to filter through those search results?
choices: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) product engineering
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) social media
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) Python
correct_answers: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity
questions.explanation: Cold calling security teams from different companies Contacting a CISO directly via email Joining different security associations (CORRECT) Doing an internet search for entry-level security analysts in your area

questions.question: 9. Fill in the blank: _____ is a great way to connect with security professionals without using social media.
choices: Cold calling security teams from different companies
Contacting a CISO directly via email
Doing an internet search for entry-level security analysts in your area
questions.explanation: “Top CISOs in my area” “Industry associations” “Incident response teams” “Cybersecurity industry associations” (CORRECT)

questions.question: 10. What is the best search term to use to find a security organization to join?
questions.explanation: Krebs Explains Security Risk Management for Security Geeks OWASP (CORRECT) CSO Online

questions.question: 11. You are being interviewed for a cybersecurity analyst role with a mid-level organization. During the interview, the hiring manager asks you what resources you believe are most valuable for staying up-to-date on the most critical security risks to web applications. Which of the following resources would you suggest?
questions.explanation: Security Investigation by Krebs Krebs on Security (CORRECT) Online CISO Kreb’s Security Perspective

questions.question: 12. Which security website covers security news and investigations into cyber attacks?
questions.explanation: The CSO Security Expert Digest The Security CISO Online CSO Online (CORRECT) CSO Tips for Beginners

questions.question: 13. Which site do many CISOs in the security industry review for security tips and ideas?
questions.explanation: Searching for them on social media (CORRECT) Staying away from social media Calling different organizations and asking to speak with their security teams Asking friends and family members who are not in the security industry to connect you with people they know

questions.question: 14. You’ve recently completed the Google Cybersecurity Certificate and decide it’s time to connect with other security professionals. Which of the following is a great way to connect with security professionals?
choices: Searching for them on social media
Calling different organizations and asking to speak with their security teams
Asking friends and family members who are not in the security industry to connect you with people they know
correct_answers: Searching for them on social media
questions.explanation: Follow leaders in the security industry on social media (CORRECT) Read and comment on social media posts of leaders in the security industry (CORRECT) Send messages to a security supervisor until they agree to be your mentor Respond to messages of people on social media that you’re unfamiliar with, as long as their profile says they’re in the security industry

questions.question: 15. Which of the following is a good way to use social media to connect with security professionals? Select two answers.
choices: Follow leaders in the security industry on social media
Read and comment on social media posts of leaders in the security industry
Send messages to a security supervisor until they agree to be your mentor
Respond to messages of people on social media that you’re unfamiliar with, as long as their profile says they’re in the security industry
correct_answers: Follow leaders in the security industry on social media
Read and comment on social media posts of leaders in the security industry
questions.explanation: cross-reference check background check internet search (CORRECT) external security audit

questions.question: 16. Fill in the blank: The first step to finding a CISO to follow on social media is to conduct a(n) _____ for the name of the CISO of an organization.
questions.explanation: Search for security engineers on LinkedIn® Put out a social media post that asks all security analysts to follow you Cold call various security teams until someone agrees to connect with you on social media Search for cybersecurity analysts on LinkedIn® (CORRECT)

questions.question: 17. What is a good way to find other security analysts in the industry to follow on social media?
choices: Search for security engineers on LinkedIn®
Put out a social media post that asks all security analysts to follow you
Cold call various security teams until someone agrees to connect with you on social media
Search for cybersecurity analysts on LinkedIn®
correct_answers: Search for cybersecurity analysts on LinkedIn®
questions.explanation: Search for CISOs on LinkedIn® Attend a social media training seminar Join different security associations (CORRECT) Do an internet search for entry-level security analysts in your area

questions.question: 18. What is a great way to connect with security professionals or find mentors in the security industry without using social media?
choices: Attend a social media training seminar
Do an internet search for entry-level security analysts in your area
questions.explanation: is within a five-mile radius of your home has excellent online reviews aligns with your professional goals ( CORRECT) is dedicated to senior-level analysts

questions.question: 19. Fill in the blank: Selecting a security association that _____ will help ensure you find the one that best fits your needs.
choices: is within a five-mile radius of your home
aligns with your professional goals ( CORRECT)
correct_answers: aligns with your professional goals ( CORRECT)
questions.explanation: human resources professionals courses events (CORRECT) products

questions.question: 20. Fill in the blank: A great way to find other security analysts to connect with on LinkedIn® is to set your filter to locate _____ that focus on security-related topics that interest you.
questions.explanation: Who Knows Security? Krebs Explains Security Risk Management for Security Geeks CSO Online (CORRECT)

questions.question: 21. Fill in the blank: _____ provides news, analysis, and research on various security and risk management topics.
questions.explanation: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) Python Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) social media Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) product engineering Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity (CORRECT)

questions.question: 22. On social networks like LinkedIn®, you can find security professionals by searching for “cybersecurity analysts” or a similar search term. After this search, what is the best way to filter through those search results?
choices: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) Python
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) social media
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) product engineering
Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity
correct_answers: Filter for people who talk about # (hashtag) cybersecurity
questions.explanation: select one that is geared towards advanced security professionals join one that is closest to where you live, so you’re able to attend in person select one that aligns with your professional goals (CORRECT) ask the CISO of the most recent organization you applied to for suggestions

questions.question: 23. Fill in the blank: When determining a security association to join, it’s important to _____.
choices: select one that is geared towards advanced security professionals
join one that is closest to where you live, so you’re able to attend in person
select one that aligns with your professional goals
ask the CISO of the most recent organization you applied to for suggestions
correct_answers: select one that aligns with your professional goals
questions.explanation: Wall Street Journal OWASP (CORRECT) Programming for Security Protection Red Teaming Blog
